question: Which Union Ministry is conducting a quiz titled ‘Atmanirbhar Bharat – Swatantra Bharat’ on MyGov platform?
explanation:
Ministry of Defence is conducting an online quiz titled ‘Atmanirbhar Bharat – Swatantra Bharat’ on MyGov platform.
The objective of the quiz is to create a patriotic feeling among the citizens especially the youth. The Ministry will conduct quiz till August 10, as a part of the Independence Day Celebrations. Indian citizens of age 14 years and above can participate in the quiz.
